name: Taith (Rlpcap, JulianBernabeu, Florencia Fernandez)
description:
Hi! We are a group of 3 students from "Escuela Da Vinci", Argentina, and Taith is our final student project, we really hope you enjoy it as much as we do.

Taith village has lost its magic. Join Noi on his journey to retrieve the magic and save the village. But beware as a dark force hides within its villagers.

Platform: PC
Engine: Unity
Genre: Plataform / Puzzle

Rafael López Pisani | Programmer and Game Designer

 Julián Bernabeu | Programmer and Game Designer

Florencia Fernández | Artist and Game Designer

  • Download .7z file.
  •  Extract file.
  • Execute "Taith.exe".
